summary: NAR 3-11-03  THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A LETTER FROM PONTIAC STATING THAT A RECALL HAD BEEN ISSUED FOR THE POWER STEERING GEAR. THE CONSUMER HAD RECENTLY PAID APPROX  $1,192.09 FOR REPAIRS TO FIX THE STEERING GEAR ON HIS VEHICLE. THE CONSUMER THEN SENT IN THE RECEIPTS OF THE AMOUNT OF MONEY SPENT TO FIX THE  PROBLEM AND REQUESTED REIMBURSEMENT BUT HIS CLAIMS WERE REJECTED.   *CB *JB
